feature.label: Kilim For Eclipse
feature.description:
Kilim is a framework for Java that provides ultra-lightweight threads and facilities for sending messages between these threads. Kilim uses bytecode instrumentation to weave thread management into your code. This Eclipse plugin makes it easy to add Kilim support to your Eclipse Java projects.
Just add Kilim library to your Eclipse Java project, then enable this builder and your classes will automagically be instrumented to work with Kilim.
See http://www.malhar.net/sriram/kilim/ for more information about Kilim.
